name: 1000 Cuts: Jomaku
description:
Jomaku (除幕) "Curtain-raiser" an short act or monologue to introduce a longer kabuki play.

1000 Cuts: Jomaku is a 60-90 minute preview experience of One-Thousand Cuts, with a short tutorial, plenty of exploration (over a dozen hidden pettable cats, bonus lore drops, three alternative video modes, even an optional boss), unlockable upgrades, a three-phase final boss, and multiple endings based on which moral route you choose.
